// Example commands to add MCPs: claude mcp add filesystem npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -- -y "@modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem" "C:\Users\[USERNAME]\Documents"
claude mcp add memory npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -- -y "@modelcontextprotocol/server-memory"
claude mcp add sequential-thinking npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -- -y "@modelcontextprotocol/server-sequential-thinking"
claude mcp add desktop-commander npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -- -y "@wonderwhy-er/desktop-commander@latest"
claude mcp add perplexity npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -e PERPLEXITY_API_KEY=[YOUR_KEY] -- -y "server-perplexity-ask"
claude mcp add converse npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -e OPENAI_API_KEY=[YOUR_KEY] -e GEMINI_API_KEY=[YOUR_KEY] -- -y "converse-mcp-server"
claude mcp add rag-context npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -e RAG_DATA_DIR="C:\Users\[USERNAME]\ClaudeRAG\data" -e RAG_LOG_DIR="C:\Users\[USERNAME]\ClaudeRAG\logs" -- -y "@notbnull/mcp-rag-context"
claude mcp add playwright npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -- -y "@playwright/mcp@0.0.37" --browser chromium
claude mcp add sqlite npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -- -y "mcp-sqlite" "C:\Users\[USERNAME]\mcp-servers\databases\sqlite\unified.db"
claude mcp add git-ops npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -e GIT_REPO_PATH="C:\Users\[USERNAME]\mcp-servers" -- -y "@cyanheads/git-mcp-server"
claude mcp add github-manager npx -e GITHUB_PERSONAL_ACCESS_TOKEN=[YOUR_TOKEN] -- -y "@modelcontextprotocol/server-github"
claude mcp add web-search npx -e NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 -e BRAVE_API_KEY=[YOUR_KEY] -- -y "@modelcontextprotocol/server-brave-search"
